Loading auction items info use items/getItemsInfo api to load items info. this will supply all data needed for viewing and placing absentee bids including: Lots start prices Lots leading bids Self absentee bids Sold lots Favorite items Indication if an auction is live (to enable redirection to bidspirit live auction server) Current live bid

Response: an array of stepsInfo where each stepInfo is an array of two integers in the format [fromPrice, stepPrice] . to build possible bid values from the increments step you can look at the initIncrementSteps() function in the working example which is sent to you (in case you didn't get it, please ask for it).

Свзяь с плагинов Email Customizer, в отведённое время, не удалось реализовать по причине не простой связи. Сделал отдельным способом уведомления по документации woocommerce.
Закрытие аукциона происходит автоматически или если владелец аукционного дома сделает это вручную на сайте системы bidspirit.
За 1 час до начала на странице аукциона будет отображена кнопка "To live auction", при нажатии на которую произойдёт переход на страницу проведения аукциона.

An hour before the auction, the auction state moves from PENDING to PRE_AUCTION. At this point, in the live auction screen, there is a timer that starts from 60 minutes and goes down. At your side, an hour before the auction, you should display a button "To live auction" that takes to xxx.bidspirit.com, whilte "xxx" is the code of the auction house in the bidspirit system.

We fill the auction with lots and all related information. It is important to indicate the date of the auction and the commission of the auction house. After that, it will be possible to transfer the auction to READY status by clicking the "Publish to bidspirit portal" button in the "Catalog" tab. After the next synchronization, the auction and all its lots will be available to users of the site.
Upcoming auctions

Сообщение
Body message
We've just noticed you got your Moodo device(s)! We hope you'll enjoy it very much!
So when, and only when there is at least 1 Moodo device in the order, please send a new mail to the customer with custom text we can edit and link to unboxing video, like:

After parcel was delivered, we auto-update the status of the order to "delivered", but no email is being sent.and we need another email to be auto-sent with the following block above the order details:

Then, after the warehouse ships the parcel, we auto-update the order with the tracking number and carrier, and change the status to "shipped" (renamed from completed) and customer gets another email with tracking link, like in attached "shipped" image
After the successful payment, customer will get an email for the order, like attached "processing" image.
Please check the unboxing video below to get your Moodo device connected with your mobile application:
